p.d: The X Games Real series sees the best athletes of one field competing in an original contest to produce the best video segment of their discipline. For this 2018 Real Snow edition, six notorious snowboarders will battle for the ultimate part of the year: Anto Chamberland, Bode Merrill, Benny Urban, Dan Brisse, Frank Bourgeois and Ozzy Henning. Contenders of exception imply elite judging that guarantees a high level of productions and all the aspects will be analysed â€“ tricks, editing work and music choice.
